summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the period from March 1, 2018, to March 31, 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and account management instructions.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document outlines the account balance as of March 31, 2018, which was $389,515.00.
It details a deposit of $51,820.00 made on March 8, 2018.
Service charges for the statement period totaled $50.00.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in transactions within specified time frames.
It mentions that all items are credited subject to final collection and receipt of proceeds.
